text: Kris led the way off the trail and into the jungle, she wanted some impressive jungle photos for her Facebook and Lisanne, naturally the more sensible, followed reluctantly, not wanting to be boring, this was an adventure trip  after all. Well, fools rush in and just as Lisanne had decided to put her foot down and insist they return,  Kris decided on one more photo opportunity, one risk to many and took a serious fall breaking her leg. Lisanne made 911 calls from both mobiles but alas no signal. It dawned on her that there was no way her friend could be helped back up the the way they came and they were trapped where they were with night falling. Bravely the girls staggered down the mountain side for 24 hours towards the sound of running water. Exhausted they made camp at the riverbank clearing by the monkey bridge and hoped to be found by someone passing through or seen from above by a rescue helicopter. Still badly injured and passing in and out of consciousness Kris was in no position to move again. Lisanne had to make a choice, leave friend and go got help or sit tight and trust that a rescue party would reach them. The loyal friend stayed but there would be no rescue and by April 8th Kris had passed into a coma and was dying. As the night drew in the animals of the jungle picked up the scent of death and a lone Jaguar stalked the area and could not be driven off by the flashlights of Lisanne’s camera. The attack when it came was swift and decisive , Lisanne already weekend and unable to defend herself succumbed to the the jungle predator and the girls fate was complete. Maybe the search party found the aftermath of this gruesome scene eventually, maybe it went unnoticed. Maybe it was better left unsaid. RIP Dutch girls

text:
A simple analysis of the fate of the two girls.

 • When they tried to return, they lost the way, stumbled and fell from a slope and could not continue walking because one of them was seriously injured, so the other tried to call from her device, and when the device’s battery ran out, she tried to use her friend’s device, who was likely fainting or was dead.  It opened and then called 911, and then the battery went off.

 •: She tried to shoot with flash at night to attract attention and ask for help
 This is the reason for the mysterious pictures, most of which were taken at night.

 •: Three things may be the reason for their end.

 1- They died due to their injury and lack of health care.
 2- Or, hunger and thirst may be the cause.

 3- Attacking them by a predator.

 •: It is likely that the girls' end was at the hands of a predator.
 As for the smell of blood attracting him, he attacked them while they were alive and could not defend themselves.

 If he preys upon them after their death, their end suggests that they were exposed to the prey for the following reasons.

 • The foot of one of the girls that they found while it is still stuck in her shoe with a small part of the leg is a very clear sign of her leg being "bitten" by a predator

 1- The two girls' clothes were cut and cracked, and the condition in which I found it is very strong evidence of their exposure to predation.

 2- The presence of very little remains of their corpses indicates a high probability that the other "missing" parts were eaten by predators.

 3- The state of ambiguity

 •: As for the woman who found the bag, she may be the one who took the bag out of curiosity or who took the bag from someone she knew for the purpose of looting its contents and for some reason they returned it to where the woman found it for the first time and her saying that she did not see the bag the previous day was motivated by fear and dispersal of the authorities  And it may have been she who arranged the two girls' clothes and placed them on one of the rocks.

 •: There is no clear evidence that he committed a crime with these two girls at all, and the ambiguity that prevailed over their story is nothing but evidence that there is no (fabricated crime)

text:
I do think this was a tragic accident and that the pictures were purposefully done at night as a last desperate attempt for other people to notice them. They went off the trail, got lost and Kris got seriously hurt by falling or by an animal. From there, Lisanne went to get water and looked for something edible, but not too far to stay close to her friend to tend her wounds or maybe she was too scared an animal would come again and prey on her friend.
Around 5th april Kris passed away because of the lack of medical attention. Lisanne then put the remaining stuff in the backpack and tried to at least get herself out of there. She wandered around for 3 days, maybe even collapsed and on a last desperate attempt, shot those photos with flashes for someone to notice her. I don't think the deleted photo is too strange, like it was the last one of the daytime ones, she could've just accidently shot it and just deleted it asap. Then it got corrupted and irrecoverable because some of the data was overwritten by the 90 night time photos.
But I don't know about the backpack, it should've been somewhere close to Lisanne and I don't think animals would carry it so far with nothing edible being in there.
It's just puzzling how and where the bones and the backpack were found, like Lisannes should've been somewhere far off and the backpack with her and not everything spaced out and some bones together and stuff.

Regardless of which theory is correct, it just pains me to see that if the searches at 3rd april had already manage to find them, they both probably would've been saved.

Would have to ask my mom about further details, but that's not really the point. Nothing supernatural about this experience, just sad... and a reminder to keep a translation dictionary with you, I guess.
